tagline.title: ULUWATU AND TANAH LOT TOUR IS A BALI HALF DAY TOUR PACKAGE TO ENJOY VISITING THE BEAUTIFUL ULUWATU TEMPLE AND TANAH LOT TEMPLE
tagline.text: ULUWATU AND TANAH LOT TOUR IS A BALI HALF DAY TOUR PACKAGE TO ENJOY VISITING THE BEAUTIFUL ULUWATU TEMPLE AND TANAH LOT TEMPLE
tagline.html: ULUWATU AND TANAH LOT TOUR IS A BALI HALF DAY TOUR PACKAGE TO ENJOY VISITING THE BEAUTIFUL ULUWATU TEMPLE AND TANAH LOT TEMPLE

description.text: Bali Uluwatu Tanah Lot Tour is a Bali Half Day Tour to visit Two beautiful and amazing temple in Bali Islands which is Tanah Lot Temple and Uluwatu Temple in one day and then continue enjoy fresh seafood dinner at jimbaran bay. Places of interest will be visit during Uluwatu Tanah Lot Tour is the Tanah Lot Temple is a Balinese Hindu temple on the rock located in the middle of sea, after finish visit the tanah lot temple, we will continue the tour to visit the Uluwatu Temple in the south of the island, is one of Balinese Hindu Temples located right on the petrifying hill with the crevasse exist in the right and left side, the tour continue to enjoy watching Kecak Dance Performance Is a spectacular traditional dance with the group of people playing this dance with fire game and Fresh Seafood Dinner at Jimbaran Beach. The Uluwatu Tanah Lot Tour will bring you to the wonderful memory with experiences as the feature of this package. Our professional Bali Tours Driver is always outstanding offer our best services to keep your convenience trip along with private full air-conditioning car transfer to complete your enjoyable on Bali Uluwatu Tanah Lot Tour.

title.title: Tanah Lot Temple | Uluwatu and Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Uluwatu Tanah Lot Tour | Tanah Lot Temple | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Tanah Lot Temple is a Balinese Hindu temple on the rock located in the middle of sea and we will be visit during Uluwatu Tanah Lot Tour. Tanah Lot Temple is very beautiful in the particular of the sunset time. The temple is built on the rock with 3 acre size and reachable in a few minute by walk, because it is just 20 meters from the coastal lip. At some nooks of coral reef around Tanah Lot Temple. The word of Tanah Lot is consisted of two words that are Tanah word interpreted as a reef looking like gili or island. Lot or Lod word has meaning the sea. So Tanah Lot is meaning the small island floating on the sea, this can be seen from the existence of the Tanah Lot temple which is located on a rock in the sea near the beach, with its uniqueness if the sea water rises it will look like the Tanah Lot temple is floating in the ocean, a very unique phenomenon

button.title: Tanah Lot Temple | Uluwatu and Tanah Lot Tour

title.title: Uluwatu Temple | Uluwatu and Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Uluwatu Tanah Lot Tour | Uluwatu Temple | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Uluwatu Temple is located in Pecatu Village, Uluwatu Temple sits on a 70-meter-high cliff protruding above Indonesian Ocean. Because of its unique location, visitors to the temple have to take a long stone stairway to reach it. There are hundreds of monkeys roaming along the path outside the temple, they are believed to guard the temple from bad influences. There hasn't been any significant erosion on the shoreline underneath the temple's towering cliff. Believers regard it as a manifestation of the divine power that protects Uluwatu Temple or most known as a Cliff Temple. A natural scenery that is phenomenally beautiful, seeing the sunset with the background of the Indian Ocean is so beautiful, seeing the process of the sun falling into a very memorable sight at this Uluwatu temple

title.title: Kecak and Fire Dance Performance | Uluwatu Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Uluwatu Tanah Lot Tour | Kecak and Fire Dance Performance | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Kecak Dance is a spectacular traditional dance with the group of people playing this dance with fire game. It is very exciting and unique dance due to the sound of gamelan is not using the normal gamelan but use their mouth. What makes the Kecak special is that the accompanying music is provided by the human voice, the gamelan suara, a choir of a hundred men or more sitting in concentric circles, swaying, standing up, lying prone as the story develops. The story is a fragment from the Ramayana, the Hindu epic which finds its expression in many forms, not only in dance, but also in painting and carving. Very impressive traditional dance performances performed by Balinese dancers with graceful curves and interesting storylines will make the experience of watching Kecak dance during the Uluwatu Tanah Lot tour very memorable.

title.title: Jimbaran Bay Beach Dinner | Uluwatu and Tanah Lot Tour

image.title: Uluwatu Tanah Lot Tour | Jimbaran Bay Beach Dinner | Bali Golden Tour

description.text: Jimbaran Beach is a beautiful beach located in the southern part of Bali with white sand unfolding along the coastal. Jimbaran Beach was always just a small fishing village, but in the 1980's developers moved in to exploit its glorious beaches. However it is still very much a fishing village and it is always pleasing to see when villagers have directly benefited from tourism. The Jimbaran Beach takes on a whole new dimension as sunset approaches. The professional chefs make the special recipe to make the seafood dinner more delicious, you will taste the food like in five star hotel food. Spending the night with dinner at Jimbaran beach accompanied by the sound of the waves and the coastal breeze will greatly add to the romantic atmosphere, with delicious seafood dishes that will make the atmosphere very memorable.

price.title: Uluwatu Tanah Lot Tour Price :
price.content:
Uluwatu Tanah Lot Tour Price :

The tour we provide is Based on Private Tour, We offer three price you can choose which is Regular Tours Price and Inclusive Tours Price, Please see below the details of Uluwatu Tanah Lot Tour Packages price :

Regular Tours Price :

IDR 550,000/car ( 1 till 6 person included)
IDR 850,000/minibus ( 1 till 12 person included)
IDR 1,150.000/minibus ( 1 till 17 person included)
IDR 2,500.000/bus ( 1 till 30 person included)
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + English Speaking Driver
Note : Parking Fee, Entrance fee and Dinner is not include in the price

Or

Inclusive Tours Price :

Price Include with Seafood Dinner
IDR 900,000/person
Note : For Inclusive Price is minimun Booking 2 Person
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + Parking Fee + English Speaking Driver + Entrance Fee + Ticket Kecak Dance Performance + Seafood Dinner Package at Jimbaran + Mineral Water

Or

Price Without Seafood Dinner
IDR 600,000/person
Note : For Inclusive Price is minimun Booking 2 Person
Inclusion : Private Car / Minibus / Bus with Good A/C + Petrol + Parking Fee + English Speaking Driver + Entrance Fee + Ticket Kecak Dance Performance + Mineral Water

content.event: Visit Tanah Lot Temple
Watching Kecak Dance Performance
Seafood dinner at Jimbaran Beach

inclusion:
Seminyak, Legian, Kuta, Nusa Dua, Jimbaran, Pecatu, Sanur, Ubud, Canggu, Denpasar, Benoa Harbour, Airport
Please contact us for pick up in different area

• The price already include with 21% Government tax and Services
  • Get special price for group booking
  • Regular Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price without include dinner and entrance fee, you need to pay by your own self
  • Inclusive Tours Price : is a Bali day tours price with include dinner and entrance fee
  • The tour is Private Tours, means there is no other participant, just only you and your companion
  • The Tour will assist by English Speaking Tours Driver
  • Tour Guide can be requested, contact us if you want to request Tour Guide during the trip
  • Time and Tourism site is subject to change based on your request.
  • Use contact form provide to send us message, asking information or make tour booking request.

• Payment is Cash Payment
  • Payment is on the day itself with our driver
  • Payment with other currency will convert based on daily exchange rate
